author: Carrie Arnold, Janus Rose
title: The Amish Are Getting a COVID-19 Drive-Through Testing Center For Horse and Buggies
description: Doctors in Central Pennsylvania are opening a drive-through clinic that specifically caters to vulnerable Amish and Mennonite communities.
content: Hospitals and clinics in cities across the U.S. have recently established drive-through testing for COVID-19. Its the strategy that enabled countries like South Korea and Japan to test as many as one out of every 142 people for SARS-CoV-2, the virus that caus… [+5255 chars]
